title: Confront the Elder Brain
content:
Confront the Elder Brain Type Quest Act Act 3 Location High Hall Reward

Confront the Elder Brain

Confront the Elder Brain is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Confront the Elder Brain can be acquired during 3 and begins after the cutscene featuring the Netherbrain. Completing Quests allows players to learn more about the world and characters in Baldur's Gate 3, as well as earning more loot and experience to become more powerful.

Confront the Elder Brain Objectives

Control the Elder Brain

Destroy
